ComicInfo.Summary: Dorothy's travels through the land of Oz in search of the Veridian Scepter bring her face to face with one danger after another. Luckily along with the danger with the she also finds new allies in the Lion, Tin Man and Scarecrow...but unknown to Dorothy and Glinda one of these new companions may not be the noble friend they pretend to be.
ComicInfo.Title: Part 3 of 6; Witches, Woodsmen, and Wasps
